text: The 8th Orgburo of the Russian Communist Party (Bolsheviks) was elected by the 1st Plenary Session of the 8th Central Committee, in the immediate aftermath of the 8th Congress. ==Full members== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" ! scope="col" |Name (birth–death) ! scope="col" | Took office ! scope="col" | Left office ! scope="col" | Duration ! scope="col" style="width:30em;" | Note |- ! scope="row" | (1891–1938) | 25 March 1919 | 11 October 1919 | | align="left" | Relieved of his duties. |- ! scope="row" | (1883–1938) | 25 March 1919 | 5 April 1920 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1890–1937) | 25 March 1919 | 5 April 1920 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1878–1953) | 25 March 1919 | 5 April 1920 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1873–1966) | 25 March 1919 | 5 April 1920 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1877–1926) | 13 August 1919 | 5 April 1920 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1883–1936) | 13 August 1919 | 5 April 1920 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1873–1941) | 11 October 1919 | 5 April 1920 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1883–1940) | 8 November 1919 | 5 April 1920 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1875–1946) | 29 November 1919 | 5 April 1920 | | — |} ==Candidate members== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" ! scope="col" |Name (birth–death) ! scope="col" | Took office ! scope="col" | Left office ! scope="col" | Duration ! scope="col" style="width:30em;" | Note |- ! scope="row" | (1873–1959) | 25 March 1919 | 5 April 1920 | | — |} Category:Members of the Orgburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union
title: 8th Orgburo of the Russian Communist Party (Bolsheviks)
